meta.title: Olmo Aviation - Aerospace Innovation
meta.description: Innovative aerospace solutions with precision, reliability, and cutting-edge technology.

hero.title: Pioneering the Future of Aviation
hero.subtitle: Delivering innovative aerospace solutions with precision, reliability, and cutting-edge technology.

about.title: About Olmo Aviation
about.subtitle: A global leader in aerospace innovation with over two decades of experience delivering cutting-edge solutions for commercial and defense applications.
about.paragraph1: At Olmo Aviation, we're committed to advancing the frontiers of aerospace technology through innovation, precision engineering, and unwavering commitment to quality.
about.paragraph2: Our vision is to shape the future of aviation by developing sustainable, efficient, and revolutionary aerospace solutions that transform how people and goods move across the globe.
about.experienceText: Of aerospace industry excellence and innovation

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We deliver comprehensive aerospace solutions that combine innovation, precision engineering, and uncompromising quality.

aircraftDesign.title: Aircraft Design
aircraftDesign.description: Innovative design solutions for commercial, military, and private aircraft that optimize performance and efficiency.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Repair
maintenance.description: Comprehensive maintenance services with state-of-the-art facilities and certified technicians.

performance.title: Performance Analysis
performance.description: Advanced data analytics and performance monitoring to optimize aircraft operations and reduce costs.

safety.title: Safety Systems
safety.description: Cutting-edge safety systems and protocols that exceed industry standards and regulations.

avionics.title: Avionics Solutions
avionics.description: Next-generation avionics technology for enhanced navigation, communication, and flight management.

training.title: Training Programs
training.description: Specialized training for pilots, engineers, and maintenance personnel using advanced simulators.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions or need more information about our services? Our team is ready to assist you.
contact.getInTouchText: Fill out the form and one of our representatives will contact you promptly to discuss how Olmo Aviation can meet your aerospace needs.

form.messageDetails: Tell us about your project or inquiry

footer.description: A global leader in aerospace innovation, delivering cutting-edge solutions for commercial and defense applications with uncompromising quality and precision.
